meta.aesthetic_summary: Bold, modern consumer retail aesthetic anchored by a deep forest-green brand identity on warm off-white surfaces. Typography is editorial and confident, with the Satoshi typeface and tight leading reinforcing the premium, fashion-forward character. The palette is restrained — forest green, near-white, and a vivid pink accent — giving the system a clear, confident identity with excellent contrast.
meta.dominant_approach: Bold forest-green retail with editorial Satoshi typography and warm off-white surfaces

400.$description: Green 400 — light-mode inverted action, dark-mode primary action and feedback success

800.$description: Forest 800 — primary brand green; CTA buttons, border focus, action primary (light)

950.$description: Forest 950 — darkest surface background (dark mode default)

700.$description: Sage 700 — secondary text (light), derived midpoint text.primary/text.muted

400.$description: Pink 400 — feedback error (dark mode), lighter variant of brand accent

500.$description: Pink 500 — feedback error (light mode); vivid brand accent

white.$description: Pure white — raised surface (light), text inverse, surface overlay (light)

primary.$description: Primary interactive elements: CTA buttons, selected states. Forest green light / bright green dark.

secondary.$description: Derived: secondary/ghost interactive elements. Light sage background light / deep green-gray dark. No benchmark contained this role.

destructive.$description: Derived: standard red — danger actions (delete, remove, irreversible operations). No benchmark contained this role.

default.$description: Default page/screen background. Warm off-white light / deep forest-black dark.

raised.$description: Card and elevated surface, above default. Pure white light / dark forest-green dark.

overlay.$description: Derived: surface.default lightened for modal/drawer backgrounds. White light / dark gray dark.

inset.$description: Derived: surface.default darkened for recessed surfaces (inputs, code blocks). Slightly deeper sage light / deeper forest dark.

primary.$description: Primary body text and headings. Dark forest-green-tinted near-black light / warm near-white dark.

secondary.$description: Derived: midpoint between text.primary and text.muted. Mid-tone sage green-gray for supporting text.

muted.$description: Disabled, placeholder, caption, and subdued label text. Muted gray-green.

inverse.$description: Text on colored surfaces (e.g. white text on forest-green button).

link.$description: Derived: same as action.primary — hyperlinks use the primary action color.

default.$description: Standard borders and dividers. Very light sage light / mid-dark sage dark. Dark mode derived: Step 4b heuristic.

focus.$description: Focus ring color for accessibility. Matches primary action color. Dark mode derived: same as action.primary dark.

success.$description: Derived: standard green — success states and confirmations. No benchmark contained this role.

error.$description: Error and destructive feedback states. Vivid pink observed in benchmark. Dark mode: lighter pink variant.

warning.$description: Derived: standard amber — warning states. No benchmark contained this role.

info.$description: Derived: uses brand action color for informational states — no blue in the Luxora palette. No benchmark contained this role.

component-gap.$description: Gap between components in a layout (comfortable: 12px)

aesthetic.summary: Bold, modern consumer retail with a deep forest-green brand identity against warm off-white surfaces. Typography is editorial and confident — Satoshi at tight leading, bold weights on hero text. The palette is intentionally restrained: forest green, near-white, and a vivid pink accent create a clear, premium-but-approachable identity.

platform_notes.react: Use CSS custom properties for color tokens to enable runtime theme switching. Apply --color-*: initial; in @theme to suppress Tailwind defaults. Font fallback stacks should be included in the CSS font-family declarations.
platform_notes.swiftui: Reference colors via asset catalog (Color("name", bundle: .module)) for automatic dark mode. Use @ScaledMetric for spacing constants. Minimum deployment target is iOS 16.
